Anthony Brockett

Software Engineer - Full Stack Developer

I am a 1st generation college graduate looking to break the status quo and follow my passion.

In my previous profession as a Corporate Tax Accountant, I honed my time and project management skills as I juggled multiple projects at a time. Additionally, attention to detail was in the job description, so I have improved my skills there as well.

As I become a more experienced Software Developer, I aim to perpetually grow my skill set and increase the value I add to my team. Ultimately, I see myself leading a team in an organization focused on growth where I can cultivate new talent and develop software to further optimize processes already in place.

The Ledger

There is no magic behind the idea of this website: it is a simple, compact tool to log and keep track of income and expenses. It is so easy to fall into the "out-of-sight, out-of-mind" mindset when it comes to finances, but this application will attempt to address much of the heavy lifting.

View on GitHub

Fitness Planner

The idea behind this platform is simple: there are an endless number of workouts out there, and keeping track of the ones you love is difficult!

By utilizing this platform, you will be able to add your favorite workouts, add exercises to them, and, best of all, keep them in one place!

View on GitHub

Simply Recipes

Do you enjoy cooking but never know what to cook? You've come to the right place!

With Simply Recipes you will be able to create new recipes and view submissions by other users all in one place!

View on GitHub

Blackjack

Fun Fact: The origin of the name "Blackjack" is commonly traced to casinos that were present in America's infancy that hosted a bonus that would pay out if a player had an Ace of Spades and a "Black" Jack (Jack of Clubs or Jack of Spades.)

Blackjack is one of the most well-known card games in the world, and it is likely due to the fact that when the rules are reduced to a singular idea it is simple: make 21.

View on GitHub
